asset.author: FashionTV
asset.hookText:
http://www.FashionTV.com/videos NEW YORK - FashionTV can't take its eyes off the runway at the BCBGMAXAZRIA Spring/Summer 2014 collection at Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week New York. It was all about color-blocking and layering for this season. Asymmetrical draping and belts gave the pieces an artful nonchalance and a few of the pieces included transparent pleating to give a bit of unexpected drama. The singular focus was easy, urban daywear that, with a bit of restyling, could easily take you into cocktail hour. Semi-sheer black long sleeve shirts and cream tights were the base for fluid frocks printed in sharp geometric patterns and neutral tones. 

Appearances: Manuela Frey, Yumi Lambert, Tilda Lindstam, Mariana Deleeuw, Kayley Chabot, and Mackenzie Dratzen.

Comment: If you had to pick one item, which would you choose?
